 May 9, 2024 

 NGEx Drills 429.4 Metres at 2.31% Copper Equivalent, Including 102.7 Metres at 4.26% Copper Equivalent and 13.2 Metres at 16.24% Copper Equivalent at Lunahuasi 

 Read More : NGEx Drills 429.4 Metres at 2.31% Copper Equivalent, Including 102.7 Metres at 4.26% Copper Equivalent and 13.2 Metres at 16.24% Copper Equivalent at Lunahuasi 

 

 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 



 
 News  



 
 

 
 
 March 25, 2025 

 NGEx Reports 2024 Results; Phase 3 Drilling at Lunahuasi Project Continues to Showcase Significant Grades and Scale 



 
 Read more : NGEx Reports 2024 Results; Phase 3 Drilling at Lunahuasi Project Continues to Showcase Significant Grades and Scale 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 March 13, 2025 

 NGEx Drills 51.50m at 4.37% Cu and 10.42 g/t Au (12.26% CuEq), including 21.50m at 8.71% Cu and 23.81 g/t Au (26.68% CuEq), and 27.40m at 7.80% Cu and 23.17 g/t Au (25.19% CuEq) at Lunahuasi 



 
 Read more : NGEx Drills 51.50m at 4.37% Cu and 10.42 g/t Au (12.26% CuEq), including 21.50m at 8.71% Cu and 23.81 g/t Au (26.68% CuEq), and 27.40m at 7.80% Cu and 23.17 g/t Au (25.19% CuEq) at Lunahuasi 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 February 19, 2025 

 NGEx Drills 53.50m at 7.79% CuEq, 75.45m at 4.95% CuEq, and 15.25m at 16.56% CuEq at Lunahuasi, With Successful Step Out Holes Now Extending Mineralization Over 1,000m North to South 



 
 Read more : NGEx Drills 53.50m at 7.79% CuEq, 75.45m at 4.95% CuEq, and 15.25m at 16.56% CuEq at Lunahuasi, With Successful Step Out Holes Now Extending Mineralization Over 1,000m North to South 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 January 22, 2025 

 NGEx Drills 51.10m at 13.84% CuEq within 205.35m at 5.08% CuEq at Lunahuasi, Expands Program to 25,000m with Two Additional Rigs 



 
 Read more : NGEx Drills 51.10m at 13.84% CuEq within 205.35m at 5.08% CuEq at Lunahuasi, Expands Program to 25,000m with Two Additional Rigs 

 

 
 View PDF 
 


 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 December 18, 2024 

 NGEx Drills 12.25m at 23.35% CuEq and 11.90m at 10.74% CuEq at Lunahuasi 



 
 Read more : NGEx Drills 12.25m at 23.35% CuEq and 11.90m at 10.74% CuEq at Lunahuasi

 November 12, 2024 

 NGEx Reports Q3 2024 Results; Closing of Successful Financing and Restart of Drilling at High-grade Lunahuasi Project 



 
 Read more : NGEx Reports Q3 2024 Results; Closing of Successful Financing and Restart of Drilling at High-grade Lunahuasi Project

 NGEx Minerals Closes Upsized C$176.9 Million Private Placement

 NGEx Kicks Off Phase 3 Drill Program at Lunahuasi

       Privacy Overview
